entity.description: Year long fiscal calendar of an organization. A span of time during which the financial activities of an organization are calculated.

attributes.name: userfiscalcalendarid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user associated with the annual fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: salespersonid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the sales person associated with the sales quota.

attributes.name: fiscalperiodtype
attributes.description: Type of fiscal period used in the sales quota.

attributes.name: effectiveon
attributes.description: Date and time when the fiscal calendar sales quota takes effect.

attributes.name: annual
attributes.description: Sales quota for the first period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: createdby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who created the quota for the annual fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: createdon
attributes.description: Date and time when the quota for the annual fiscal calendar was created.

attributes.name: modifiedby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the quota for the annual fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: modifiedon
attributes.description: Date and time when the annual fiscal calendar was last modified.

attributes.name: transactioncurrencyid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the annual fiscal calendar.

attributes.name: exchangerate
attributes.description: Exchange rate for the currency associated with the annual fiscal calendar with respect to the base currency.

attributes.name: utcconversiontimezonecode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: annual_base
attributes.description: Base currency equivalent of the sales quota for the first period in the fiscal year.

attributes.name: createdonbehalfby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the annualfiscalcalendar.

attributes.name: modifiedonbehalfby
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the annualfiscalcalendar.
